log_text: [Shift 1] Shift C: Compressor 1 discharge temperature increased steadily to 140°C. Vibration baseline shifted upward. Oil level slightly below minimum mark.
summary_text: Compressor overheating likely due to low oil level and rising vibration. Refill oil and inspect bearings.

log_text: [Shift 1] Conveyor tail pulley noise louder than normal. Thermal camera shows hotspot at bearing housing. Belt tension appears uneven across width.
summary_text: Tail pulley bearing overheating and belt tension imbalance. Check bearing and retension belt.

log_text: [Shift 1] AG mill feed rate fluctuating between 225–310 tph. Control system attempted corrections but load cell readings unstable.
summary_text: Feed rate instability caused by noisy load cell data. Inspect load cell calibration and wiring.

log_text: [Shift 1] Pump 4 was cavitating intermittently. Suction pressure dropped below design. Operator reported air bubbles visible in sight glass.
summary_text: Pump cavitation due to air ingress on suction side. Inspect suction pipe for leaks.

log_text: [Shift 1] Filter press cycle time increased from 28 min to 44 min. Cake moisture higher than normal. Feed slurry density inconsistent.
summary_text: Long cycle time and wet cake caused by inconsistent slurry density. Stabilize upstream thickener control.

log_text: [Shift 1] Hydraulic press ram speed reduced by 30%. Fluid temperature reached 68°C. Strainer showed significant contamination.
summary_text: Press slowdown due to hydraulic fluid contamination. Replace fluid and clean strainer.

log_text: [Shift 1] Boiler flame instability reported twice during evening shift. Fuel pressure dropped by 15%. Atomizer nozzle partially blocked.
summary_text: Boiler instability due to blocked atomizer nozzle and low fuel pressure. Clean nozzle and restore pressure.

log_text: [Shift 1] Gearbox 2 vibration at 2× running speed increased significantly. Oil splash sampling indicates metallic particles.
summary_text: Possible gear tooth wear in Gearbox 2. Schedule inspection.

log_text: [Shift 1] Cooling tower fan current increased from 16 A to 24 A. Blades show algae build-up. Water quality not controlled.
summary_text: Blade fouling causing fan overload. Clean blades and improve water treatment.

log_text: [Shift 1] Crusher discharge size larger than expected. Operator observed uneven mantle wear. CSS control acting sluggish.
summary_text: Oversized product due to mantle wear and slow CSS control. Inspect mantle and calibrate CSS.

log_text: [Shift 1] Control valve CV-32 oscillating around setpoint. Positioner shows delay. Instrument air pressure borderline low.
summary_text: Valve oscillation from low air pressure and sluggish positioner. Fix air supply and tune positioner.

log_text: [Shift 1] Stack emission opacity increased to 25%. ESP rapping system malfunctioning. Hopper ash level high.
summary_text: High opacity due to ESP rapping and ash build-up. Restore rapping and empty hopper.

log_text: [Shift 1] AG mill liner wear sensors triggered. Noise signature indicates higher impact on shell liners.
summary_text: Shell liner wear progressing. Plan replacement in next shutdown.

log_text: [Shift 1] Electrical panel temperature exceeded 60°C. Cooling fan not operational. Slight burnt smell detected.
summary_text: Panel overheating from failed fan. Replace fan and check wiring.

log_text: [Shift 1] Fuel pump tripped twice on overload. Suction filter partially blocked. Fuel viscosity high in cold conditions.
summary_text: Pump overload due to filter blockage and high viscosity. Clean filter and improve preheating.

log_text: [Shift 1] AG mill discharge pump vibrating intermittently. Shaft alignment off. Bearing housing warmer than normal.
summary_text: Pump misalignment causing vibration. Realign and inspect bearings.

log_text: [Shift 1] Water tank level transmitter showing erratic readings. Moisture detected in transmitter head.
summary_text: Faulty readings due to moisture ingress. Dry or replace transmitter.

log_text: [Shift 1] Bucket elevator jammed twice. Foreign object found in boot. Chain tension low.
summary_text: Elevator jamming from debris and low chain tension. Clean boot and retension chain.

log_text: [Shift 1] Baghouse DP rising steadily. Some bags leaking dust. Pulse cleaning ineffective.
summary_text: High DP due to damaged bags and poor cleaning. Replace leaking bags.

log_text: [Shift 1] Fan 7 axial vibration increased. Soft foot suspected. Mounting bolts unevenly tightened.
summary_text: Axial vibration due to soft foot. Relevel and tighten mounting bolts.

log_text: [Shift 1] Boiler feed pump current increased 18%. Impeller noise suggests erosion. Water quality parameters out of range.
summary_text: Pump overload likely due to impeller erosion caused by poor water quality.

log_text: [Shift 1] Shift B: Motor winding temperature trending upward. Cooling vents blocked with dust.
summary_text: Motor overheating due to blocked cooling vents. Clean vents.

log_text: [Shift 1] Conveyor 5 magnetic separator not removing metallic fines. Magnet strength appears weak.
summary_text: Ineffective separation due to weak magnet. Recalibrate or replace magnet.

log_text: [Shift 1] Steam valve slow to respond. Valve stem friction high. Packing gland too tight.
summary_text: Valve sluggishness from overtight packing. Adjust packing.

log_text: [Shift 1] Pump discharge pressure oscillating. Air entrapped in suction line. Noisy bearings reported.
summary_text: Pressure oscillation due to air in suction line. Purge air and inspect bearings.

log_text: [Shift 1] AG mill power draw reduced unexpectedly. Feed size coarser than normal. Trommel screen partially blocked.
summary_text: Reduced power draw from coarse feed and blocked screen. Clean screen and stabilize feed.

log_text: [Shift 1] Cooling water outlet temperature rising. Heat exchanger fouled with scale.
summary_text: Poor cooling due to scale buildup. Clean heat exchanger.

log_text: [Shift 1] Shift A: Lubrication pump running intermittently. Sight glass shows foamy oil.
summary_text: Intermittent lubrication due to air in oil. Check seals and aeration.

log_text: [Shift 1] Hydraulic system pressure stuck at 110 bar (below 160 bar). Relief valve leaking internally.
summary_text: Low hydraulic pressure due to relief valve leakage. Repair or replace valve.

log_text: [Shift 1] Conveyor belt tracking poorly near head pulley. Skirt rubber worn. Loading point uneven.
summary_text: Poor tracking due to worn skirting and uneven loading. Replace skirting and correct loading.

log_text: [Shift 1] Motor starter tripped twice. Contact resistance high. Contactors worn.
summary_text: Starter trips caused by worn contactors. Replace contactors.

log_text: [Shift 1] Boiler drum level controller overshooting. Level transmitter calibration drifted.
summary_text: Drum level instability from transmitter drift. Recalibrate transmitter.

log_text: [Shift 1] Stack fan vibration spiked suddenly. Coupling misalignment suspected.
summary_text: Vibration spike due to misaligned coupling. Realign coupling.

log_text: [Shift 1] Conveyor 2 tripped due to belt slip. Drive pulley lagging rubber worn.
summary_text: Belt slip due to worn lagging. Replace pulley lagging.

log_text: [Shift 1] Shift C: Steam trap leaking continuously. Condensate line temperature high.
summary_text: Steam trap failed open. Replace trap.

log_text: [Shift 1] Mill lubrication oil filter DP rising. Oil appears dark, contaminated.
summary_text: High filter DP due to dirty oil. Replace filter and oil.

log_text: [Shift 1] Cooling fan 3 making rattling noise. Blade looseness observed.
summary_text: Rattling caused by loose blades. Tighten or replace blades.

log_text: [Shift 1] Pump 7 shaft seal leaking lightly. Drip increasing gradually.
summary_text: Seal wear causing leakage. Replace shaft seal.

log_text: [Shift 1] Turbine governor response lagging. Hydraulic actuator sluggish.
summary_text: Governor lag caused by actuator sluggishness. Service actuator.

log_text: [Shift 1] AG mill sound level unusually low, indicating low impact. Mill likely underfilled.
summary_text: Low sound suggests underfilling. Increase feed rate.

log_text: [Shift 1] Cyclone overflow unusually dilute. Underflow density low. Apex likely worn.
summary_text: Dilute overflow due to worn apex. Replace cyclone apex.

log_text: [Shift 1] Boiler feed pump bearings hot to touch. Lubrication frequency overdue.
summary_text: Bearing overheating due to missed lubrication. Lubricate immediately.

log_text: [Shift 1] Conveyor skirt rubber generating burning smell. Excess friction with belt.
summary_text: Skirt rubber rubbing belt excessively. Adjust skirt clearance.

log_text: [Shift 1] Motor insulation resistance low during IR test. Moisture detected.
summary_text: Low IR from moisture ingress. Dry motor windings.

log_text: [Shift 1] Pump 2 delivering low flow. Impeller clogged with debris.
summary_text: Low flow due to clogged impeller. Clean impeller.

log_text: [Shift 1] Belt weigher reading unstable. Load cell mounting loose.
summary_text: Unstable weight readings due to loose load cell. Tighten mounting.

log_text: [Shift 1] Gearbox input shaft seal leaking. Oil puddle forming.
summary_text: Seal failure causing oil leak. Replace shaft seal.

log_text: [Shift 1] Stack fan current fluctuating ±12%. VFD logs show voltage imbalance.
summary_text: Current fluctuation from VFD voltage imbalance. Inspect VFD power stage.

log_text: [Shift 1] Boiler soot blowing ineffective. Flue gas temperature increased by 20°C.
summary_text: Ineffective soot blowing causing high flue temperature. Inspect soot blowers.

log_text: [Shift 1] Hydraulic cylinder retracts slowly. Internal leakage suspected. Oil temperature elevated.
summary_text: Slow retract caused by internal cylinder leakage. Replace seals.

log_text: [Shift 4] Fuel pump tripped twice on overload. Suction filter partially blocked. Fuel viscosity high in cold conditions.
summary_text: Pump overload due to filter blockage and high viscosity. Clean filter and improve preheating.

log_text: [Shift 4] AG mill discharge pump vibrating intermittently. Shaft alignment off. Bearing housing warmer than normal.
summary_text: Pump misalignment causing vibration. Realign and inspect bearings.

log_text: [Shift 4] Water tank level transmitter showing erratic readings. Moisture detected in transmitter head.
summary_text: Faulty readings due to moisture ingress. Dry or replace transmitter.

log_text: [Shift 4] Bucket elevator jammed twice. Foreign object found in boot. Chain tension low.
summary_text: Elevator jamming from debris and low chain tension. Clean boot and retension chain.

log_text: [Shift 4] Baghouse DP rising steadily. Some bags leaking dust. Pulse cleaning ineffective.
summary_text: High DP due to damaged bags and poor cleaning. Replace leaking bags.

log_text: [Shift 4] Fan 7 axial vibration increased. Soft foot suspected. Mounting bolts unevenly tightened.
summary_text: Axial vibration due to soft foot. Relevel and tighten mounting bolts.

log_text: [Shift 4] Boiler feed pump current increased 18%. Impeller noise suggests erosion. Water quality parameters out of range.
summary_text: Pump overload likely due to impeller erosion caused by poor water quality.

log_text: [Shift 4] Shift B: Motor winding temperature trending upward. Cooling vents blocked with dust.
summary_text: Motor overheating due to blocked cooling vents. Clean vents.

log_text: [Shift 4] Conveyor 5 magnetic separator not removing metallic fines. Magnet strength appears weak.
summary_text: Ineffective separation due to weak magnet. Recalibrate or replace magnet.

log_text: [Shift 4] Steam valve slow to respond. Valve stem friction high. Packing gland too tight.
summary_text: Valve sluggishness from overtight packing. Adjust packing.

log_text: [Shift 4] Pump discharge pressure oscillating. Air entrapped in suction line. Noisy bearings reported.
summary_text: Pressure oscillation due to air in suction line. Purge air and inspect bearings.

log_text: [Shift 4] AG mill power draw reduced unexpectedly. Feed size coarser than normal. Trommel screen partially blocked.
summary_text: Reduced power draw from coarse feed and blocked screen. Clean screen and stabilize feed.

log_text: [Shift 4] Cooling water outlet temperature rising. Heat exchanger fouled with scale.
summary_text: Poor cooling due to scale buildup. Clean heat exchanger.

log_text: [Shift 4] Shift A: Lubrication pump running intermittently. Sight glass shows foamy oil.
summary_text: Intermittent lubrication due to air in oil. Check seals and aeration.

log_text: [Shift 4] Hydraulic system pressure stuck at 110 bar (below 160 bar). Relief valve leaking internally.
summary_text: Low hydraulic pressure due to relief valve leakage. Repair or replace valve.

log_text: [Shift 4] Conveyor belt tracking poorly near head pulley. Skirt rubber worn. Loading point uneven.
summary_text: Poor tracking due to worn skirting and uneven loading. Replace skirting and correct loading.

log_text: [Shift 4] Motor starter tripped twice. Contact resistance high. Contactors worn.
summary_text: Starter trips caused by worn contactors. Replace contactors.

log_text: [Shift 4] Boiler drum level controller overshooting. Level transmitter calibration drifted.
summary_text: Drum level instability from transmitter drift. Recalibrate transmitter.

log_text: [Shift 4] Stack fan vibration spiked suddenly. Coupling misalignment suspected.
summary_text: Vibration spike due to misaligned coupling. Realign coupling.

log_text: [Shift 4] Conveyor 2 tripped due to belt slip. Drive pulley lagging rubber worn.
summary_text: Belt slip due to worn lagging. Replace pulley lagging.

log_text: [Shift 4] Shift C: Steam trap leaking continuously. Condensate line temperature high.
summary_text: Steam trap failed open. Replace trap.

log_text: [Shift 4] Mill lubrication oil filter DP rising. Oil appears dark, contaminated.
summary_text: High filter DP due to dirty oil. Replace filter and oil.

log_text: [Shift 4] Cooling fan 3 making rattling noise. Blade looseness observed.
summary_text: Rattling caused by loose blades. Tighten or replace blades.

log_text: [Shift 4] Pump 7 shaft seal leaking lightly. Drip increasing gradually.
summary_text: Seal wear causing leakage. Replace shaft seal.

log_text: [Shift 4] Turbine governor response lagging. Hydraulic actuator sluggish.
summary_text: Governor lag caused by actuator sluggishness. Service actuator.

log_text: [Shift 4] AG mill sound level unusually low, indicating low impact. Mill likely underfilled.
summary_text: Low sound suggests underfilling. Increase feed rate.

log_text: [Shift 4] Cyclone overflow unusually dilute. Underflow density low. Apex likely worn.
summary_text: Dilute overflow due to worn apex. Replace cyclone apex.

log_text: [Shift 4] Boiler feed pump bearings hot to touch. Lubrication frequency overdue.
summary_text: Bearing overheating due to missed lubrication. Lubricate immediately.

log_text: [Shift 4] Conveyor skirt rubber generating burning smell. Excess friction with belt.
summary_text: Skirt rubber rubbing belt excessively. Adjust skirt clearance.

log_text: [Shift 4] Motor insulation resistance low during IR test. Moisture detected.
summary_text: Low IR from moisture ingress. Dry motor windings.

log_text: [Shift 4] Pump 2 delivering low flow. Impeller clogged with debris.
summary_text: Low flow due to clogged impeller. Clean impeller.

log_text: [Shift 4] Belt weigher reading unstable. Load cell mounting loose.
summary_text: Unstable weight readings due to loose load cell. Tighten mounting.

log_text: [Shift 4] Gearbox input shaft seal leaking. Oil puddle forming.
summary_text: Seal failure causing oil leak. Replace shaft seal.

log_text: [Shift 4] Stack fan current fluctuating ±12%. VFD logs show voltage imbalance.
summary_text: Current fluctuation from VFD voltage imbalance. Inspect VFD power stage.

log_text: [Shift 4] Boiler soot blowing ineffective. Flue gas temperature increased by 20°C.
summary_text: Ineffective soot blowing causing high flue temperature. Inspect soot blowers.

log_text: [Shift 4] Hydraulic cylinder retracts slowly. Internal leakage suspected. Oil temperature elevated.
summary_text: Slow retract caused by internal cylinder leakage. Replace seals.

log_text: [Shift 5] Shift C: Compressor 1 discharge temperature increased steadily to 140°C. Vibration baseline shifted upward. Oil level slightly below minimum mark.
summary_text: Compressor overheating likely due to low oil level and rising vibration. Refill oil and inspect bearings.

log_text: [Shift 5] Conveyor tail pulley noise louder than normal. Thermal camera shows hotspot at bearing housing. Belt tension appears uneven across width.
summary_text: Tail pulley bearing overheating and belt tension imbalance. Check bearing and retension belt.

log_text: [Shift 5] AG mill feed rate fluctuating between 225–310 tph. Control system attempted corrections but load cell readings unstable.
summary_text: Feed rate instability caused by noisy load cell data. Inspect load cell calibration and wiring.

log_text: [Shift 5] Pump 4 was cavitating intermittently. Suction pressure dropped below design. Operator reported air bubbles visible in sight glass.
summary_text: Pump cavitation due to air ingress on suction side. Inspect suction pipe for leaks.

log_text: [Shift 5] Filter press cycle time increased from 28 min to 44 min. Cake moisture higher than normal. Feed slurry density inconsistent.
summary_text: Long cycle time and wet cake caused by inconsistent slurry density. Stabilize upstream thickener control.

log_text: [Shift 5] Hydraulic press ram speed reduced by 30%. Fluid temperature reached 68°C. Strainer showed significant contamination.
summary_text: Press slowdown due to hydraulic fluid contamination. Replace fluid and clean strainer.

log_text: [Shift 5] Boiler flame instability reported twice during evening shift. Fuel pressure dropped by 15%. Atomizer nozzle partially blocked.
summary_text: Boiler instability due to blocked atomizer nozzle and low fuel pressure. Clean nozzle and restore pressure.

log_text: [Shift 5] Gearbox 2 vibration at 2× running speed increased significantly. Oil splash sampling indicates metallic particles.
summary_text: Possible gear tooth wear in Gearbox 2. Schedule inspection.

log_text: [Shift 5] Cooling tower fan current increased from 16 A to 24 A. Blades show algae build-up. Water quality not controlled.
summary_text: Blade fouling causing fan overload. Clean blades and improve water treatment.

log_text: [Shift 5] Crusher discharge size larger than expected. Operator observed uneven mantle wear. CSS control acting sluggish.
summary_text: Oversized product due to mantle wear and slow CSS control. Inspect mantle and calibrate CSS.

log_text: [Shift 5] Control valve CV-32 oscillating around setpoint. Positioner shows delay. Instrument air pressure borderline low.
summary_text: Valve oscillation from low air pressure and sluggish positioner. Fix air supply and tune positioner.

log_text: [Shift 5] Stack emission opacity increased to 25%. ESP rapping system malfunctioning. Hopper ash level high.
summary_text: High opacity due to ESP rapping and ash build-up. Restore rapping and empty hopper.

log_text: [Shift 5] AG mill liner wear sensors triggered. Noise signature indicates higher impact on shell liners.
summary_text: Shell liner wear progressing. Plan replacement in next shutdown.

log_text: [Shift 5] Electrical panel temperature exceeded 60°C. Cooling fan not operational. Slight burnt smell detected.
summary_text: Panel overheating from failed fan. Replace fan and check wiring.
